enchantment.sortilege.push.desc: Launches targets hit with the Staff along the beam.
enchantment.sortilege.pull.desc: Attracts targets hit with the Staff along the beam.
enchantment.sortilege.brazier.desc: Burns targets hit with the Staff.
enchantment.sortilege.blizzard.desc: Freezes targets hit with the Staff.
enchantment.sortilege.blast.desc: Make the Staff's beam explode on impact.
enchantment.sortilege.blitz.desc: Shocks targets hit with the staff.
enchantment.sortilege.ignorance_curse.de: Makes the Staff use XP to cast.
enchantment.sortilege.arcane.desc: Converts damage dealt to magic type.
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Reduces fall damage and ender pearl teleportation damage. They are completely negated at max level.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces the effects of fire damage. Also reduces the burn time when set on fire. Wearing a full set at max level completely negates them.
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Increases damage against arthropods such as Spiders and Silverfish. Also slows down opponents
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Causes the tool to lose durability at a slower rate. Max level makes the item unbreakable
sortilege.limitite.desc: Use with Lapis on a Smithing Table to increase an item's enchantment slots!
